short_summary: Supply and delivery of 3 washers and 2 dryers
description: Supply and delivery of 3 commercial/industrial washers and 2 commercial/industrial dryers at Matsqui Institution. Deliverables to be made by March 31, 2023.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Washers and Dryers for Correctional Service Canada

## Notice Type
* Category: Goods
* Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Announcement
The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure 3 commercial/industrial washers and 2 commercial/industrial dryers for Matsqui Institution. 

## Tender Description
The CSC requires the successful bidder to supply and deliver the specified quantity of washers and dryers on or before March 31, 2023. The deliverables must meet all applicable standards and specifications.

## Contract Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End-User Entity: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* End-User Entity Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0P9, Canada

## Submission Information
* Submission Type: Electronic
* URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15473758?extsite=MTU0NzM3NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15473758?extsite=MTU0NzM3NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contact Information: Katie Wong, katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Specifications
* UNSPSC Code: *47111502
* Category: *Laundry type washing machines*
* Description: The successful bidder must meet the specifications outlined in the tender package. 

## Closing Date
The RFP closes on March 2, 2023 at 14:00:00. A late bid will not be considered. 

Note that I removed unnecessary info and made key details easier to see and understand in markdown format. I also included a title for the announcement, which isn't there in the initial contractor entry. I translated important text where it was necessary. I made sure to highlight the main points and kept the rest of the text concise and clear.
